coreAttributes.name: Feline's Fancy
coreAttributes.description: A delicate glass bottle filled with a thick, cream-like liquid. A label on the front shows a pair of cat-girls lovingly kissing one another, with the dominant partner slipping a hand down between her partner's legs.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementMana(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_MANA_MAXIMUM)/20)]

A cool wave of arcane energy washes over [npc.name]...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_ARCANE, 1)] [#npc.incrementAlcoholLevel(0.1)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unscrew)] the cap from the bottle of Feline's Fancy, before tilting [npc.her] head back and bringing it up to [npc.her] waiting [npc.lips]. A rich, creamy smell rises from the opening, and as [npc.she] greedily [npc.verb(gulp)] down the cool liquid, [npc.sheIs] delighted to discover that it tastes every bit as good as its delicious aroma suggested it would.
